job.title: Software Engineer I
job.description: stronguCompany DescriptionbrbrustrongVericast is seeking a highly motivated Software Engineer The ideal candidate is energized by the thought of developing new system stacks and tools for big data ingestion processing and analytics on a multipetabyte infrastructure This individual will work on team of talented engineers responsible for reporting on the delivery of our campaigns and handling technical integrations and data ingestion They will develop products that help validate our media buys ingest data into our platform and generate datasets and reporting for our teams to analyze and monitor delivery and performance of our campaignsbrbrstronguResponsibilitiesbrbrustrongstrongJob Descriptionbrstrongulli Design develop and maintain the software and systems that drive our Display Advertising systemslili Extend our platform by researching and applying new technologies and stacks to solve business problemslili Participate in multidisciplinary projects with our applications and analytics teamslili Maintain our big data platform by diagnosing predicting and correcting scaling problemslili Contribute to our teams growing set of development platforms tools and processesbrliulstronguSkills And ExperiencebrbrustrongstrongQualificationsbrstrongulli Proficiency in Javalili Experience with Postgres Tableau Spark a pluslili Ability to learn and apply new technologies quicklylili Ability to multitask in a dynamic environmentlili Experience with Agile development methodologies is preferredlili Excellent communications skills across multidisciplinary teamslili Ability to gather requirements develop test and deploy softwarebrliulstronguAdditional InformationbrbrustrongAll qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex national origin disability status protected veteran status or any other characteristic protected by lawbrbrApplicants who have disabilities may request that accommodations
